text: Swami Gambhirananda (1899-1988), born as Jatindranath Datta, was a Hindu sanyasi associated with Ramakrishna Mission. He was born at Sadhuhati in today's Bangladesh. A graduate of Scottish Church College in Kolkata,Some Alumni of Scottish Church College in 175th Year Commemoration Volume. Scottish Church College, April 2008, p. 589 Jatindranath Datta was influenced by his teacher Swami Jagadananda.http://www.vedantastl.org/photo-gallery/the- presidents-of-ramakrishna-order/12237990 He joined the Ramakrishna Mission in 1923. He was initiated to sanyas by Swami Shivananda. A scholar, he was the 11th President of the Ramakrishna Mission. == Works == *Advaita Ashram *The apostles of Shri Ramakrishna (compiler, editor), Advaita Ashrama, 2nd ed. 1972 * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==References== Category:Heads of the Ramakrishna Mission Category:Presidents of the Ramakrishna Order Category:1889 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Khulna District Category:Scottish Church College alumni Category:University of Calcutta alumni Category:Indian religious writers Category:Monks of the Ramakrishna Mission
title: Gambhirananda
